installation.script:
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl libgdiplus lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam

chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformBitness 64 +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 1110390 +quit

mkdir -p /mnt/server/Servers/unturned/Server
touch /mnt/server/Servers/unturned/Server/Commands.dat

variables.name: OpenMod
variables.description: When the OpenMod variable is enabled it will install and update each time the server starts.

variables.name: RocketMod
variables.description: When the RocketMod variable is enabled it will install and update each time the server starts.

variables.name: Unturned Auto Update
variables.description: When the Unturned Auto Update variable is enabled it will install and update each time the server starts.

variables.name: Map
variables.description: Set the map for the server

variables.name: Name
variables.description: This sets the Server Name

variables.name: Perspective
variables.description: This changes the Perspectives in your server. You can use first,both,third, and vehicle.

variables.name: Mode
variables.description: This sets the difficulty of your server.Hard,Normal,Easy

variables.name: PVP/PVE
variables.description: This sets your Server either to PVP or PVE.

variables.name: Password
variables.description: Set a password on your Unturned Server

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Enter a number between 1-100 for Player Slots.

variables.name: uScript Auto Update
variables.description: When the uScript variable is enabled it will install and update each time the server starts.

variables.name: Owner
variables.description: Enter the Owners Steamid64.

variables.name: Welcome Message
variables.description: Enter your welcome message and this will be shown to players when they join.

variables.name: Login_Token
variables.description: This login token allows you to publically show your server on the server list.

variables.name: Server Folder
variables.description: This allows you to change the server folder. An example would be changing the default /Servers/unturned to something like /Servers/Apollo

variables.name: Game ID
variables.description: The ID corresponding to the game to download and run using SRCDS.

variables.name: Beta Branch
variables.description: Installs beta branch if specified.

variables.name: Use Legacy Config File
variables.description: This will allow the old config.json files to be used. If you want to use the new config file simply turn this off.

variables.name: No Generated Comments
variables.description: You can enable this to disable the generated comments in the config.txt file.

variables.name: Config File
variables.description: You can use this variable to set different config names for different situations, such as different difficulties or events.
